III.ii.2.A.4.b
.
Types of Records NPRC Houses
NPRC houses the following types of records:
STRs of former service members whose service ended
prior
to the dates shown in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.A.4.d
personnel records of former service members who had
no
service (active duty
or
otherwise) on or after the dates shown in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.A.4.e
, and
clinical records.
Reference
:Â  For more information on clinical records, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 2.C.1
.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - General Information on Service Records
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A
